name: I Transform Into a Wolf in the Light of the Full Moon.
name_original: I Transform Into a Wolf in the Light of the Full Moon.
description:
In this game, you play as the werewolf form of Albert, an unhappy man. Can you help show the people of the town that he's not the monster they think he is? And will Albert ever think you're not just a monster inside him?

Can you get to all 5 endings?

Controls: Left click to move, Right click to interact.

Created by Team Wolflight for the Werewolf Game Jam:

Andrew Avrick - Level Design

Christopher Wolff - Character Art/Animation

Nathan Hahn - Design/Programming

Nikhil Rao - Music/Sound Design
